title: A Long Way From Home
description: Three novelettes with themes of home.Home Sweet Home. Only it's not always sweet, or homely. Callum doesn't do sweet. Mel doesn't do homely. Sometimes the world of fantasy is actually the right one, and the facts are less important. A Long Way from Home. A wedding in Wales doesn't turn out as the father of the bride expects.Mal's a good bloke really, surely it was his time for some karma? Home is Where the Heart is. Unless it's out of town.Never mix love and business. Just when Morgan thinks he's lost it all, he finds a happy ending.
author: Jan Ruth
